message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient’s symptoms are suggestive of endometriosis, which cannot be detected by CT scan or CA-125. Transabdominal ultrasound is also unlikely to detect small endometrial implants. Laparoscopy is the gold standard for diagnosis and treatment of endometriosis. Dilation and curettage is not indicated in this case as there is no indication of a possible miscarriage or abnormal uterine bleeding.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The patient presents with symptoms of pelvic pain and painful sexual intercourse, which is most likely caused by endometriosis. Diagnostic options include laparoscopy, which is the most definitive and effective way to diagnose endometriosis. Abdominopelvic CT scan and CA-125 are not specific for endometriosis, and dilation and curettage is not appropriate for the diagnosis of endometriosis.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The symptoms, physical examination, and ultrasound suggest endometriosis, but laparoscopy is needed to confirm the diagnosis. Abdominopelvic CT scan is not necessary since ultrasound already showed no abnormalities. Cancer antigen 125 (CA-125) is not specific for endometriosis. Dilation and curettage is not indicated in this case.

Laparoscopy is the most reliable method for diagnosis of endometriosis. Abdominopelvic CT scan or CA-125 would not be helpful in diagnosing endometriosis. Dilation and curettage would not be useful as endometriosis does not involve the endometrial layer.

A laparoscopy is the most common diagnostic procedure for endometriosis. Laparoscopy is the gold standard for diagnosis and can also provide treatment options. The other options are not indicated for the diagnosis of endometriosis or PID.

Abdominopelvic CT scan and CA-125 are not specific for endometriosis, and dilation and curettage is not indicated in this case.

Abdominopelvic CT scan and CA-125 may be used to investigate other possible causes of pelvic pain, but they are not specific for endometriosis.
